topic: Inflation challenge: What are the solutions?
content:
At a time when inflation is surging and the rupee is sliding against the
dollar, we raise these questions in this Economy Roundtable: 
Is inflation India problem or a global problem? Inflation challenge: What are
the solutions? And is India better placed to meet the inflation challenge?
Watch as top economists share their perspectives.

topic: Sensex, Nifty log longest weekly losing streak since 2020
content:
Nifty 50 index closed 0.16 per cent lower at 15,782.15 and the S&P BSE Sensex
fell 0.26 per cent to 52,793.62, having risen more than 1 per cent earlier in
the session.

topic: Elon Musk's Tesla puts India entry plan on hold | Here's why
content:
The government is pushing Tesla to commit to manufacturing locally before it
will lower tariffs, which can run as high as 100 per cent on imported
vehicles.

topic: Share market update: Investors lose Rs 26 lakh crore wealth | Here's why
content:
The market cap of BSE-listed firms stood at Rs 266.97 lakh crore on April 29
this year. The amount has sharply fallen to Rs 241.13 lakh crore on May 12.

topic: SBI Q4 results: Profit jumps 41%, bad loans decline
content:
State Bank of India (SBI) had registered a profit of Rs 6,451 crore during
the January-March period of 2020-21, the country's largest lender said in a
regulatory filing.

topic: LIC IPO allotment status: Haven't received shares? All you need to know about refund
content:
Applicants, who have checked allotment status and were not allotted shares of
LIC, will get back their money as initiation of the refund process began on
Friday.

topic: Cryptocurrency market crash: Bitcoin price to remain volatile?
content:
Bitcoin's price jumped over the $30,000-mark and other Cryptocurrencies were
recovering following the collapse of TerraUSD.

topic: Aam Aadmi's woes to persist: Inflation to stay around 7%, interest rate, EMIs likely to rise
content:
The latest ECOWRAP by the economic research arm of State Bank of India
(SBI) says that with inflation likely to persist at the 6 per cent mark, the
RBI is likely to take a "sledgehammer approach and increase the repo rate
aggressively and front-load it."

topic: Rupee rises against Dollar | Check latest
content:
The rupee rebounded sharply after hitting a record low against the US dollar
for a second time this week.

topic: Sensex rises over 400 points, Nifty nears 16,000 | Top gaining stocks
content:
Nifty 50 index was up 0.92 per cent or 145.10 points at 15,953.10, with all
its major sub-indexes trading in positive territory, while the BSE Sensex
rose 0.77 per cent or 406.73 points to 53,337.04

topic: Gold, silver prices today: Yellow metal witnesses dip, silver records hike on MCX| Check latest rates here
content:
Gold, silver prices today: On Friday, May 13, while gold rates are trading on
the lower side of the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX), silver is retailing on
the higher side. Check the latest city-wise prices here.

topic: India's retail inflation rises to 8-year high of 7.79% in April
content:
The annual retail inflation surged to 7.79 per cent in April from a year ago.
In March, the retail inflation was at 6.95 per cent.
